name: Hibana

biography.description: The X-KAIROS - a 40 mm caliber launcher - fires explosive pellets that can be detonated simultaneously from a distance. Deliver innovative assaults by creating lines of sights, or new pathways!

gameplayTips: Use X-KAIROS to create new pathways or lines of sight.
Coordinate with teammates to maximize the impact of your breaching capabilities.
Be mindful of your surroundings to avoid wasting X-KAIROS charges.
